AD.name: Email From Address
AD.description: The 'from' address used when sending an email to be used when the client request product to be delivered by email.

AD.name: Email Subject Line
AD.description: The subject line used when sending an email to be used when the client request product to be delivered by email.

AD.name: Email Body
AD.description: The body text used when sending an email. The tag '%metacards.ids%' will be replaced with a list of metacard identifiers that correspond to the attached file. The tag '%metacards.titles%' will be replaced with a list of metacard titles that correspond to the attached file. To be used when the client request product to be delivered by email. Example: Attached Resources: %metacard.titles%
